entities.description: A specific code or identifier used in the survey.
Counts of responses without weighting adjustments.
The proportion of responses corresponding to each label.
The position of the variable in the dataset.
The data type of the variable (e.g., character).
Information on how missing data is accounted for in the survey.
The context of the entire NSDUH survey.

relationships.description: Associates the survey with specific labels used for categorizing responses.
Indicates the raw count of responses for each label.
Defines the proportion of the total responses corresponding to each label.
Describes the location of the variable within the dataset.
Defines the data type of the variable.
Describes the handling of missing data in the survey.
